price: za nekoliko godina – samo Allahu pripada odluka i prije i poslije – i tad će se vjernici radovati
arabic: فِي بِضۡعِ سِنِينَۗ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ مِن قَبۡلُ وَمِنۢ بَعۡدُۚ وَيَوۡمَئِذٖ يَفۡرَحُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fī biḍ'ʿi sinīna lillahi al-amru min qablu wamin baʿdu wayawma-idhin yafraḥu al-mu'minūna
